dcterms:creator: J. S. Lee
E. Pottier
dcterms:description: The Flevoland Benchmark dataset consists of a polarimetric SAR image acquired by NASA/JPL AIRSAR in 1991, featuring 14 classes including various crops and vegetation types.
dcterms:title: Flevoland Benchmark Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Dabboor
M. J. Collins
V. Karathanassi
A. Braun
dcterms:description: The San Francisco dataset is a full polarimetric SAR image that provides coverage of four targets: water, vegetation, low-density urban, and high-density urban.
dcterms:title: San Francisco Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Liu
M. Li
Y. Wu
L. Jia
H. Liu
P. Zhang
dcterms:description: The Oberpfaffenhofen dataset is an ESAR data set of the Oberpfaffenhofen area in Germany, featuring three classes: built-up areas, woodland, and open areas.
dcterms:title: Oberpfaffenhofen Dataset
